lexUnit.name: flee.v

corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

lexUnit.definition: FN: escape the site of a disaster.

sentence.text: After the soldiers of former dictator Idi Amin fled the barracks of the district capital Moroto in 1979 , they left the Karimojong with a wide range of automatic weapons .
